dcterms:creator: Yale Song
Jordi Vallmitjana
Amanda Stent
Alejandro Jaimes
dcterms:description: TVSum is a dataset for video summarization that contains 10 categories, each with 5 videos, whose lengths vary from 2 to 10 minutes. The dataset is annotated by multiple persons, providing multiple human summaries for each video.
dcterms:title: TVSum

dcterms:creator: Wen-Sheng Chu
Yale Song
Alejandro Jaimes
dcterms:description: CoSum is a dataset for video co-summarization that consists of 51 videos covering 10 categories, with lengths ranging from 1 to 12 minutes. It is also annotated by multiple persons, providing multiple human summaries for each video.
dcterms:title: CoSum

dcterms:description: YouTube619 is a dataset created by the authors for pretraining purposes, consisting of 619 videos crawled from YouTube based on category names. It is used to pretrain the classification network.
dcterms:title: YouTube619
